import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket view sort"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/views/{viewId}/sort"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the default sort order for a saved ticket view. The sort configuration determines how tickets are ordered when the view is loaded. Common sort fields include `ModifiedDate`, `CreatedDate`, `TicketPriority`, and `DueDate`.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) to list views and extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify view: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) → select `ViewId` to update
2. Update sort: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}/sort](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-view-sort) with `Field`, `Name`, and `Direction`
3. Test view: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with the view's Schema to verify new order

**Sort Fields**: TicketClosedDate, ModifiedDate, CreatedDate, TicketPriority, DueDate, Subject, TicketNumber
**Directions**: Ascending, Descending

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-view) – View current sort
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-view) – Update other view properties

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the ticket view to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Sort configuration applied to a saved view.","properties":{"Field":{"type":"string","description":"Internal field name used by the API when ordering results.","example":"TicketClosedDate"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable label shown to users for the sorted column.","example":"Closed Date"},"Direction":{"type":"string","description":"Direction applied to the sort.","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"example":"Ascending"}},"required":["Field","Name","Direction"],"title":"ViewSort"},"example":{"Field":"TicketClosedDate","Name":"Closed Date","Direction":"Ascending"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
